example1.title: Default Search (Show Quick Filters)
example1.description: Default behavior, shows all quick filter buttons

example2.title: Compact Mode (Hide Quick Filters)
example2.description: Suitable for embedding in page headers or navigation bars, saves space

example3.title: Custom Filters
example3.description: Custom filter options, regex will be automatically generated based on provided filters

example4.title: Custom Filters + Compact Mode
example4.description: Combine custom filters with compact mode for maximum flexibility

dynamicRegex.title: üîß Dynamic Regex
dynamicRegex.description: All filter regular expressions are automatically generated based on provided customFilters or default filterSuggestions. You don't need to manually maintain filter lists in multiple places!

toggleQuickFilters.title: üëÅÔ∏è Show/Hide Quick Filters
toggleQuickFilters.description: Use the showQuickFilters property to control whether to display the quick filter buttons below. Suitable for use in different UI scenarios.

customFilters.title: üé® Custom Filters
customFilters.description: Provide your own filter configuration through the customFilters property. The component will automatically handle suggestions, conversion, and search logic.

login.title: Login
login.notImplemented: This method is not implemented yet

landing.title: Laganto
landing.subtitle: An online platform designed for reading and writing enthusiasts, offering vertical and horizontal reading modes with highly customizable reading experiences.
landing.description1: Laganto is an online platform designed for reading and writing enthusiasts, offering vertical and horizontal reading modes with highly customizable reading experiences.
landing.description2: You can edit your works on the platform and share them with others to read.
landing.description3: Additionally, you can create booklists to quickly share multiple books and easily manage your reading lists.
landing.feature1: We provide an easy-to-use editor that allows you to create and share your works effortlessly.
landing.feature2: The platform is centered around the reader, adapting to various devices and providing a smooth reading experience.
landing.feature3: Automatically record reading progress, allowing you to pick up where you left off at any time.
landing.feature4: Built-in powerful search functionality to help you quickly find relevant content.
